content.raw:
I have a suggestion on 5302784 to make the new block a bit shorter. Basically:

* `plot_qt` is a list of qt headers without extension
* `plot_sources` is a list of the sources for these files
* `plot_qt_headers` are QT headers (by that I mean headers containing at least one class with `Q_OBJECT`)
* Named the library `PlotWindow` and repeated that string in a few places, we can put it in a variable if it's safer. I just think this shouldn't be confused with the list of files.
* Removed `Conversions.cc`, I think this will come from `IGNITION-GUI_LIBRARIES`

Let me know what you think.
content.html:
I have a suggestion on 5302784 to make the new block a bit shorter. Basically:

  • plot_qt is a list of qt headers without extension
  • plot_sources is a list of the sources for these files
  • plot_qt_headers are QT headers (by that I mean headers containing at least one class with Q_OBJECT)
  • Named the library PlotWindow and repeated that string in a few places, we can put it in a variable if it's safer. I just think this shouldn't be confused with the list of files.
  • Removed Conversions.cc, I think this will come from IGNITION-GUI_LIBRARIES

Let me know what you think.
